Future Engineering Utility Library

addition[source]

addition(a:Union[int, float], b:Union[int, float])

A simple addition function. Add a to b.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(addition(1,2), 3)
test_eq(addition(1.4, 1.9), 3.3)
